Light_Control.label: Light Control
Light_Control.description: This Object is used to control a light source, such as a LED or other light.  It allows a light to be turned on or off and its dimmer setting to be control as a % between 0 and 100. An optional colour setting enables a string to be used to indicate the desired colour.

On_Off.label: On/Off
On_Off.description: On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.

Dimmer.label: Dimmer
Dimmer.description: This resource represents a light dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.

On_time.label: On time
On_time.description: The time in seconds that the light has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Cumulative_active_power.label: Cumulative active power
Cumulative_active_power.description: The total power in Wh that the light has used.

Power_factor.label: Power factor
Power_factor.description: The power factor of the light.

Colour.label: Colour
Colour.description: A string representing a value in some color space

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
